## Introduction to R

We have already installed R and RStudio when we installed Radiant! We
will now get acquainted with data and its representations in R! We will
also form a view of how English Grammar ( pronouns, verbs,
adjectives,figures of speech..) get **"metaphorized"** into the R
World!!
